name: Anything You Can Do
effect: Play with a maneuver and discard 2 cards from your hand to change the strength of the maneuver to be equal to the strength of the maneuver it counters.

name: Banging Bodies
effect: Play with a turn maneuver in a curve or obstacle stage. Your opponent must discard a card randomly from his or her hand.

name: Burn the Tires
effect:
Play with a maneuver to raise the maneuver's counter by 5.
The maneuver remains in play.
While the maneuver is in play, you lose 1 Traction.

name: Celica GT4
effect:
Drive: 4WD
Turbo. Your maneuvers with "Drift" in the title have +2 strength.
Max Mods: 4

name: Computerized Ignition
effect: Before your first maneuver of the race, announce whether the Computerized Ignition provides +2 power or +1 strength to your maneuvers. After you play a maneuver with more than 2 points more counter than your opponent's last maneuver's strength, you can switch between the bonuses Computerized Ignition provides.

name: Courage
effect:
Iggy only.
Play with a maneuver to reduce the Power or Traction requirement of the maneuver by 5.
"Even Cole seems to be down with me. I guess he realizes I'm gonna be one bad ass driver!" -Iggy

name: Determination
effect:
K.T. only.
Play with a maneuver. If your maneuver's strength is below 6 (after all adjustments), raise it to 6.
"Oh? A reason, huh? Since when does a racer need a reacon to show off his skills?" -K.T.

name: Dirty Tricks
effect:
Tactic 6 Turn 6 Speed 6

Dirty Tricks remains in play. While Dirty Tricks is in play, your opponent gains +4 Style.
"No matter what the course, no matter who the opponent, I ain't about to lose." -Hawk

name: Emperor
effect:
Team

If you have a Driver, they must be a Emperors driver. May only be used with an Evo car.

Your car has a +3 mod maximum.
"We'll race with any number of people in any type of race. But if you can't defeat us in any one of those races...then we want a sticker with your race team printed on it." -Kyle

name: Fearless
effect:
Shingo only.
Play with a tactics maneuver. The power or Traction requirement of your opponent's next maneuver is increaded by 3.
"Downhill the odds are even. Uphill, I can win. This race all comes down to heart and guts." -Shingo

name: Fierce
effect:
K.T. only
Play with a tactics maneuver. Switch any two counter and/or strength values. You may switch a counter value and a strength value.

name: For a Full Tank of Gas
effect:
Tactic 4 Turn 4 Speed 6

If you have a Passenger, draw a card.
"Tak probably wanted Iggy to sit in the back so that his weight would help add more traction for the rear drive axle. It was a quick and dirty adjustment to the car for racing in rain." -Boss

name: Give It Up
effect:
Tactic 4 Turn 4 Speed 4

If your opponent's Power or Traction is currently less than 1, you win.
"There are some things you gotta learn the hard way-like taking your car and pushing it to the very edge, making it do everything it can possibly do... but still end up losing." -Bunta

name: Headset Radio
effect: Passengers do not reduce your Power.

name: Ice Challenge
effect:
Tactics 2 Turn 2 Speed 2

Challenge.
Discard all challenge cards in play. Ice Challenge remains in play. While Ice Challenge is in play, all maneuvers have -2 counter.

name: Insult to Injury
effect:
Tactics 3 Turn 3 Speed 5

If your opponent does not counter Insult to Injury, he or she draws 1 fewer card next stage.

name: Ironazaka Uphill
effect:
Stage 1: Obstacles
Stage 2: Curves
Stage 3: Straight
Maneuvers with a strength greater than 5 have +2 strength

name: Just Stay Close
effect:
Tactics 9 Turn 9 Speed 9

You lose this stage but this stage does not count towards the two consecutive stage victory condition.
"You're always trying to get into an opponent's head by tailing them and picking up every move they make." -K.T.

name: Keisuke K.T. Takahashi
effect:
Driver. RX-7 FD only.
Red Suns Team.
Your maneuvers have +1 strength.
You realize it's got nothing to do with cars. It's all about skill. Some of us have it. Some of us don't.

name: Know Your Opponent
effect:
Tactics 4 Turn 5 Speed 5

Your opponent may not play a racer's edge card with his or her next maneuver.
"Once Ry's had a chance to study a car, it's good as beat." -K.T.

name: Kyoichi Kyle Sudoh
effect:
Driver. Evo III only.
Emperor Team
When you discard a card to raise your counter value, you gain 2 counter instead of 1
Now here's something you should bear in mind-I'm not at all like the man I used to be last year...

name: Misfiring System
effect:
+2 Style.
Your opponent may not play cards with "Turbo Lag" in the title.
You have +2 Power in curve and obstacle stages if you have a Turbo mod.
"The misfiring system ended the days of turbo lag. That's my secret weapon that Ry Takahashi can't beat." -Kyle

name: More Speed
effect: Play with a speed maneuver to increase the maneuver's strength by 3.
"You want to run tonight. You need to run!" -Cole

name: Night Specialist
effect: Play with a maneuver that remains in play. While the maneuver is in play, if an opponent's card effect would discard the maneuver, the opponent must discard 3 cards or the maneuver is not discarded.

name: Overcompensate
effect:
Tactic 4 Turn 4 Speed 4

When countering Overcompensate, your opponent must counter its strength exactly. Your opponent may discard cards from his hand to reduce the counter of his or her next maneuver on a one-for-one basis.

name: Plan Three
effect:
Tactics 5 Turn 5 Speed 6

Emperors only.

This maneuver has +3 strength if you have both more power and more traction than your opponent.
"Kyle has three plans for racing an opponent in their home territory. We only use plan 3 when the opponent is somebody really formidable." -Hawk

name: Pulling Ahead
effect:
Tactics 2 Turn 2 Speed 2

Lead car only.
Pulling Ahead has +2 strength if your car has more Power than your opponent's.
"No way I'm gonna let you catch me. I'm going to pull further and further ahead of you." -Kent

name: Quick Thinking
effect: Play with a maneuver to make it a tactics maneuver.
"This is crazy! I'm not driving. I'm being driven!" -Tak

name: Racing Tires
effect:
Tires
+2 Traction.

name: Recovery Speed
effect: Play with a maneuver. If you have more Power than your opponent, the strength of your opponent's last maneuver is halved (round up).

name: Roll Cage
effect:
+1 Style.
Your opponent's cards that target your mods must target Roll Cage, if able.

name: Shifting Paddles
effect:
Steering Wheel.
+2 Style.
Your maneuvers have +1 strength in curve and obstacle stages.

name: Sluggish Turns
effect: Play with a maneuver to increase the counter of the maneuver by the number of mods your opponent has.
"You don't understand, Yuichi. The understeer will allow a good driver to accelerate faster when it's FR. for the purpose of carrying tofu, I usually keep the setting a bit lower than that." -Bunta

name: Surprise
effect:
Cole only.
Play with a maneuver. If your opponent's last maneuver has a strength above 5, reduce it to 5.
"There's an unwritten law for street racers. Protect your turf!" -Cole

name: Suspension Computer
effect:
Before your first maneuver of the race, announce whether the Suspension Computer provides +2 Traction or +1 counter to your maneuvers.
After you play a maneuver with more counter than your opponent's last maneuver's strength, you can switch between bonuses Suspension Computer provides.

name: Turn on a Dime
effect:
Tactics 4 Turn 4 Speed 4

Turn on a Dime remains in play, targeting the player whose Traction is lower when it is played (both players if there is a tie).
While Turn on a Dime is in play, the target loses -1 Traction (-2 Traction if it was played in a curve stage).

name: Unstoppable
effect:
Tactics 5 Turn 5 Speed 7

Kyle only.

This Maneuver's strength is equal to your car's Power.
"We let the person with the car with less power start first. We consider that the handicap for having a more powerful car." -Kyle

name: Xenon Headlights
effect: Once per stage, when you play a tactics maneuver to counter a maneuver that remains in play, discard your opponent's maneuver.
